localize.text: You've been travelling for a while now. Best if you give yourself a break and prepare for the events to come.
Seems that a nearby local market is having an event! You decide to go in and, if anything, just check the products.

You hear a strange noise in a nearby alleyway, naturally turning away from it, though as you turn to leave a figure appears -- a short girl dressed in Zwei uniform and armored skirt, carrying a rusted sword and shield on her back -- the most striking part of her figure is her skull, which is mostly missing as if chewed off by a large beast.
In its place is a constant stream of [mirror]familiar sparkling powder[/color], as well as in her weapons. She greets you with a bow, speaking with an otherworldly voice.
"[mirror]S-shard[/color]... Greetings, I am [mirror]Cassiopeia[/color]... the [mirror]It[/color] has sent me to give you... a boon. So... what do... you want...?"
Boon of Might ([green]Gain {0} of the current Chapter's Combat Pages[/color])
Boon of Endurance ([green]Gain {0} of the current Chapter's Key Pages[/color])
Boon of Fortitude ([green]All Librarians recover 25% HP[/color])

[mirror]Cassiopeia[/color] touches your chest, materializing the desired boon in you. She displays a shy frown, meekly skittering away as your interaction ends. You can catch a glimpse of a smile as she stare towards you.
A rundown vending machine, the glass so cloudy you cannot see its insides. Despite the battered state the machine still seems to work, though the product you'll receive is unknown.
Put money in a vending machine ([red]Pay 10[/color] [yellow]Ahn[/color], [green]gain a random Consumable Item[/color])
